## PublishingService.getItemsToPublish() method

Gets a list of items that will be published when executing the specified instructions. This operation returns an instance of 'ResolvedItem' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getItemsToPublish({ requestModel, }: {
        requestModel: PublishRequest;
    }): CancelablePromise<Array<ResolvedItem>>;
```
